channel.title: Hosting a server and playing on it? Possibly stupid question
channel.description: Can you host a server and play on it? I host a server and it doesn't lag until about 30 people are on it, but whenever I try to log on and play on the host pc/connection it starts to lag insanely and everyone disconnects. What's the issue? [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Read the rules, this topic is for the development process of servers and to help other people with their problems in development.[/center]

item.title: Hosting a server and playing on it? Possibly stupid question
item.dc:creator: @asteroidblues asteroidblues
item.description:
@asteroidblues wrote:

What could be wrong?

So it’s not normal to lag while playing on the server and hosting it at the same time? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2008, 04:08:28 PM[/size][hr]Anyone else experience this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2008, 04:09:38 PM[/size][hr]Anyone else experience this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2008, 06:42:24 PM[/size][hr]Bump! :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting a server and playing on it? Possibly stupid question
item.dc:creator: @asteroidblues asteroidblues
item.description:
@asteroidblues wrote:
